title: Master of Mystery
description:
Before she became a world-famous author, 36-year-old Agatha Christie disappeared in a way that only she could have written. The mystery of her disappearance caused the largest manhunt in England’s history and changed the course of her life.

Pre-order Marie’s novel about Agatha Christie, The Mystery of Mrs. Christie, from Amazon, Barnes & Noble, or an independent bookstore near you

Follow Marie Benedict on Instagram, order her novels, and learn more about her work at authormariebenedict.com 

Our Week of Women illustration is by Nina Chhita: @nina.draws.scientists
